lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: It's better than charity!
lender.occupational_info: Manager in a computer software company

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: it makes sense

lender.name: Mitsuaki
lender.loan_because: I want to be helpful for somebody.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: Lending (instead of giving) automatically encourages those people who are trying to become self-sufficient, instead of waiting for the world to solve all their problems for them. In addition, if you GIVE someone food or clothing, you take away the oppertunity for someone in the impoverished area to support themselves by selling food or clothing. By loaning to resourceful people in the area, you are supporting the role models.
lender.occupational_info: I design and repair electronic test equipment used in the evaluation of prototype diesel engines.

lender.name: Scott & Garrett Smith
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to have the ability to do so for so many of those who are in need.

lender.name: christopher
lender.loan_because: I have money available, and this seems like a really practical and efficient way of mobilising capital for people who otherwise find it really tough to make a living. Come on, everyone in the developed world can find US$25 to commit. I also like the way the Kiva site works, making good use of the internet technology. It's a lot more useful than Myspace or Facebook.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a journalist (mainly in Latin America), a volunteer in Africa, and a serial starter of companies, mainly in technology-based publishing ventures. I am now a semi-retired investor in start-up companies.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of people reaching for a dream.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an operator in an oil refinery. We process crude oil into diesel fuel, jet fuel and gasoline.

lender.name: Ofelia
lender.loan_because: I want to play a part in making the world a better place.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It shows me and others there is real good in the world
lender.occupational_info: Very busy and stressful, but rewarding.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: As part of my Christian discipleship I want to share what I have been given. Kiva loans are a great way of recycling some of my giving so that the I can make a difference for more people.
lender.occupational_info: I write and sell training courses in food hygiene to commercial, social and voluntary organisations mainly in the UK.

lender.name: Serban
lender.loan_because: To move forward as a human race we must first get rid of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Providing life-saving medications to millions of people around the planet.

lender.name: Sara
lender.occupation: Professional of Home Staging and Redesign

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: I have more that most in this world and it's my turn to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Helpful, supportive, creative, thoughtful

lender.name: Nestor
lender.loan_because: I can, and because I think its a great idea. Leveraging the web in this manner is a great way to get credit to those who otherwise would not have access to it.
lender.occupational_info: I co-own and help run a manufacturing company that employs people, and makes interesting architectural products

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: It is a small way to pass on some some of the blessings that I have.
lender.occupational_info: I create whimsical mixed media art.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to use commerce to improve their lives and the world.
lender.occupational_info: I produce and sell healthy and fitness products like books, audio programs, videos, newsletters , exercise equipment, nutritional supplements and more.

lender.name: Vid
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I am able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large U.S. retail company. I ensure that their imported product meet all U.S. Customs and Other Government Agency regulations.

lender.name: Brian and Sarah
lender.loan_because: there are those in this world who are less fortunate than we are.
lender.occupational_info: We are both educators, my wife in French, and myself in music. I am also a professional musician.

lender.name: Reza
lender.loan_because: This is the most productive and self-sustainable charitable approach I have come across...

lender.name: Patrick & Marilyn
lender.loan_because: karma. People have helped us in the past, so now that we can we help others.
lender.occupational_info: Patrick is a programmer, Marilyn is a Product Manager at Amazon

lender.name: Roger & Mona
lender.loan_because: We find satisfaction in providing seed money to those who want better themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Retired, but trying to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: helping people help themselves resonates with me.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the finance field for a technology company.

lender.name: Petri
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Kaisu
lender.loan_because: I believe a loan is more useful than a hand-out.
lender.occupational_info: helping teach students who have learning disabilities or other challenges, like physical handicaps.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: It takes money to make money and I applaud their hard work and determination. I want their example to ripple through the World.
lender.occupational_info: I have made a life of helping people save and invest money.

lender.name: JosÃ©
lender.loan_because: 100$ in some countries are more worth than in others.

lender.name: Barbara and Dennis
lender.loan_because: I care about the people of the world and I think everyone should have an opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Barbara is a school librarian. I teach children in a city school about the importance of reading and I teach them how to find the information they need. Dennis is a speech pathologist and works with patients in a hospital who have had strokes or surgery to be able to speak or swallow again.

lender.name: meggie
lender.loan_because: i want to help people who want to start own business, cozz i know that can be very difficult.
lender.occupational_info: I am owner off a company who publish a paper every week, with add off company's who are looking for new staff.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate and blessed and want to use my blessings to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I provide insurance policies to small non profit organizations.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to work for themselves, provide a valuable product/service to their local market, and reap the profit that they deserve from doing so.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I endorse for several brand name products in the health and beauty industry. We help other people go into business for themselves as well and provide an environment where they can become influential leaders in their families, their organizations and in their communities!

lender.name: Nathalie
lender.loan_because: a little help form us can help someone create a world of difference for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: As an architect I design buildings, like private houses and offices. My goal is to design buildings which are sustainable.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: One person at a time, times many persons makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach urban planning to graduate students and research and write about urban plannng issues.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: it is such a beautiful way to contribute to the welfare of all

lender.name: Elana And Luke
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and have two wonderful children from Guatemala and I want to give something back.
lender.occupational_info: Design and create computer systems to solve complex business problems.

lender.name: Darius
lender.loan_because: these are people who would otherwise have no line of credit. The pursuit of happiness is the right of all people.
lender.occupational_info: I use computers to simulate minerals and other Earth materials.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: gotta help!

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of micro-lending.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I am impressed by the drive of these entrepreneurs, and I know my small donation can make a huge impact on improving the quality of life of others around the globe.

lender.name: Pam and Allen
lender.loan_because: "Happiness is not so much in "having" as "sharing". We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give."
lender.occupational_info: Allen: I work with software and computer technology. Pam: I am an optician, helping people with their eye glasses and vision needs.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel like I am making a difference and I like that.

lender.name: SonriseJrHiGirlz
lender.loan_because: God's love flows through us!
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of Jr. Hi. Students who want to share with the world.

lender.name: Venkat Kolluri
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage, support, and empower entrepreneurs across the world.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.occupational_info: My job is to help low-income adults learn the skills they need to get better jobs so they can support themselves and their families.

lender.name: Ciancio
lender.loan_because: I would like to see more people have the opportunity to earn a good living. Even little things can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: Software Development - Computer Systems

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world to better their lives, and seeing the pictures and hearing their stories makes helping them more personal.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate changes to our website, keep our computers up and running and help issue insurance policies for pawnshops.

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: I want to see others succeed and benefit their communities in a positive way.

lender.name: Ms. Ghost
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, and as a small business owner, I not only see but fully understand the importance and impact of this sort of action.
lender.occupational_info: I make different things and try to sell them online, I go to community college, and I work in the framing department and Michael's Arts and Crafts.

lender.name: Lorry
lender.loan_because: It's a small but progressive step toward equalizing the world's wealth. I'm so grateful to KIVA for giving me a do-able way to make a positive difference.
lender.occupational_info: I paint and draw, mainly people. Everything about our planet is astounding, but nothing fascinates me like our own species.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because:
My knowledge of Kiva began when my sister gave me an electronic gift certificate to Kiva for Christmas.
My husband and I took a huge interest in helping people less privileged than us.
We lend money because, after being introduced to the organization, we believe in assisting people looking to make a better life for themselves, their families, and their community.
We are especially interested in assisting entrepreneurs involved with renewable energy.
Long story short -- we lend because we can, because morally we should.
lender.occupational_info: I am a palliative care coordinator. Palliative care aims to relieve suffering and improve quality of life for patients with advanced illness and their families. Palliative care is provided by an interdisciplinary team and offered in conjunction with all other appropriate forms of medical treatment. As a nurse coordinator, I work with a team that includes a physician, the nurse, a social worker, a chaplain, and a music therapist. I spend alot of time looking at patient's physical symptoms, but also a significant amount of time is spent dealing with the emotional aspect of the patient and the family.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: To those who are given much, much is expected.

lender.name: Marlene Boychak
lender.loan_because: I believe this is how I can give back some of what has been given to me and help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I develop and support programs used for computer or manufacturing process controls.

lender.name: Abi
lender.loan_because: if everyone who had a little bit more would reach out to someone who has a little less, we could all significantly reduce the economic disparity in the world, and help the world evolve humanitarially.

lender.name: Art
lender.loan_because:
See my Micro Loan VIDEO about reducing extreme poverty in the world, posted on the web Go to youtube.com and search for Art Roberts. The video will come right up at the top. or www.google.com and then search for theartroberts and the video will show up right there.
Micro loaning is the most important thing we all must absolutely do and at a minimum of one loan to someone each and every month because Micro loaning instantly improves the world for another person. Besides, the best joyous fun feeling is created when we share our wealth with another person and see their life improve just because they received that support and love from us.
lender.occupational_info: I make and provide the most powerful, yet very inexpensive, learning tool games that help all kids, anywhere in the world, memorize the very important basic Adding and Subtracting numbers plus much much more.

lender.name: Jon & Susan
lender.loan_because: people helping people

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I come from a small business family. People with a good ideas, entrepenurial spirit, and the desire to make their lives better should not pass up an opportunity due to limited finances, especially when the amount of money they need is readily available in a more industrialized country.

lender.name: Brandon and Jamie
lender.occupational_info: Long days, lots of travel.

lender.name: Barbora
lender.loan_because: I can imagine the direct results, and not merely hope that I'm making a difference. I am confident that the money will be put to good use, and people will improve their situations. And really, even though a student's life is hard, I can do without a couple of bucks.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, taking environmental studies at York University. I'm learning about how political and economic forces affect the environment, and what I can do to help.

lender.name: Scott and Denise
lender.loan_because: We love the opportunity to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Dena
lender.loan_because: I like supporting positive development in the world. I believe in peaceful actions, not war. I want to share my wealth and resources with those less fortunate. And lending through Kiva is easy.
lender.occupational_info: I teach art, dance, music and theater to students from Kindergarten through 8th grade in a very small town in a rural state.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and support small business.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the opportunity to put their ideas into action.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: it is a small way that I can help make a difference.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I have so much, and this takes so little to make a difference. We are blessed, and blessings should be shared.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who have stories to tell, so their voice will be heard.

lender.name: wanda
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves. As a small business owner in this country I know how hard it can be to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I try to make people feel good while they are with me. That will help them have a better day which in turn and help others. Pay it forward.

lender.name: Andre
lender.loan_because: I like to help people, especially people who work very hard and have a difficult life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in charge of a computer network in a University.

lender.name: Kellie
lender.loan_because: it's important to promote and support small businesses across the globe. A healthy global economy includes successful small businesses.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because:
"Find out how much God has given you and from it take what you need; the remainder is needed by others."
---St. Augustine

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: more of us should.

lender.name: Elijah
lender.loan_because: Politics aside, we are all one family, and we should take care of each other. Don't believe otherwise!!
lender.occupational_info: musician/service industry worker (bar/nightclub)

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: God has given His Son for me. I respond with generosity and build His kingdom by encouraging the development of small business.
lender.occupational_info: I administrate and do audio & video production on various programs for release around the world on DVD & web streaming, in many languages.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a major manufacturer in the United States.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: with donations there is no guarantee that the people who really need the money get it. This is a direct approach which I really like

lender.name: Katy
lender.loan_because: I like to see what a little bit of money and faith in someone can do.
lender.occupational_info: I studied Political Science, International Relations, and History. I am also a wife and mother

lender.name: Jodie
lender.loan_because: I' d like to help someone support their family and because God has been good to me.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because:
I have a strong interest in social justice, and I believe that micro-financing can help us to accomplish Goal 8 of the Millennium Development Goals. I believe that making a change starts with me.
I also believe in Christ, and my faith compels me to act.
lender.occupational_info:
As a BSW, I help to connect others to the resources they need to be successful. This may mean connecting them to housing and food, helping to train them for a job, or working through their mental health.
As a global citizen, I am committed to advocating for those whose voices are not heard. I am both obligated and compelled to fight for social justice.
As an non-profit staff member, I am part of a workforce development program for young adults in our nation's capital in order to empower them to take advantage of the opportunities that education provides. For our program, this includes GED education and construction training, per the YouthBuild model.

lender.name: Myra, Hanky and Chip
lender.loan_because: giving something back to the world is important to us. More than anything, its our way to help someone make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher, my son Hank is 12 years old; he started his own business three years ago, and my son Myron "Chip" is 4 years old.

lender.name: Asaf
lender.loan_because: I believe that if others do not have the same opportunities we do, but they are still willing to work towards bettering their life, we should help.
lender.occupational_info:
I want to raise awareness towards the poverty in the world. Many people do not understand that even though we "need" the money, many actually need it to survive.
A small donation will not change my life, but it will it might change someone else's.

lender.name: Kjetil
lender.loan_because: Because i think Kiva represents a fantastic opportunity for me to make a difference for real people, and i know the money is put to better use than if i kept them in my bank.

lender.name: cindy
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I help my husband sell seafood that he catches off of his boat.

lender.name: Toby and Miles
lender.loan_because: to help people who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: Studying lots of things to get smarter

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: Our daughter introduced us to kiva with a gift certificate for the holidays. She had already shared news about one of her loans. We were so proud of her for investing in other peoples lives. Couldn't wait to get started with our own account. Have totally enjoyed loaning and reading about the progress of our people. Also have been inspired to give gift certificates to get others involved. What at great idea!

lender.name: richard & rickie kendall
lender.loan_because: its a place to start to make a change in the world
lender.occupational_info: tradesman

lender.name: Camren
lender.loan_because: My Uncle is a Lender and he's getting me started with Kiva. Since pretty much everything he does is cool I knew I wanted to learn more about helping others...
lender.occupational_info: I just really like to be a helper

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: this is an incredible opportunity to help others succeed.

lender.name: Kipp
lender.loan_because: I was introduced to this amazing program by amazing friends of mine, Asad and Olivia as an amazing birthday gift!
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy helping protect and enhance natural resources using fire as a tool.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I've worked in microfinance and I've witnessed its transformative impact.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: it brings me joy.
lender.occupational_info: I manage operations at a small medical device company that makes products that help physicians diagnose cancer.

lender.name: Adam & Victoria
lender.loan_because: we are keen to help people build viable businesses so they don't have to live in extreme poverty any more.
lender.occupational_info: We record and produce Voice Overs for TV, radio and corporations all over the world.

lender.name: dadang
lender.loan_because: i loan because for develop my business. I have a little business. i sell book, equipment education to school & traditional market. order to, i can change in my life.
lender.occupational_info: i buy to distributor, then i re-seller to buyer/retailer. i have margin bruto 30-45%.

lender.name: September
lender.occupational_info: I use the law and the U.S. legal system to help citizens protect the environment and our natural resources.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of loaning directly to a person and knowing exactly how I am helping.
lender.occupational_info: I solve puzzles using computers.

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: I live a comfortable life and I want to share what the Lord has given me with those who need help improving their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software for a small manufacturing company.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: My family wanted to do something together to help others. This is a family project that we hope to continue to grow a little at a time.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: My father gave each of his children a Kiva gift certificate, so I continually re-loan to improve the quality of life around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Currently a student studying Mechanical Engineering with an emphasis studying Fluid Dynamics.

lender.name: Andrew M.
lender.loan_because: It such a small thing to do, but means a lot to the people who are trying so hard to support their families with their entrepreneurial ideas.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a business manager for a Daily newspaper.

lender.name: Deana
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a hand sometime.

lender.name: Erin and Sara
lender.loan_because: Our dad introduced us to this site and gave us money to loan to KIVA for Christmas. We would like to get more involved in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Erin is going to UCSB this fall. She went to Ghana with AFS last summer for a community service team mission for 4 weeks. Sara is a sophomore and is in Interact and will hopefully study abroad too.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is a testament to how a little help can go a long way. It helps people help themselves, which allows for a sustainable and lasting impact. Organizations like Kiva are sending a message that any average person can make a difference and fight poverty.

lender.name: Marathon Communications
lender.loan_because: We believe that we are making a difference in lives with our work and we want to extend our success to other enterpreneurs in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are a corporate training company that helps employees to be more successful in their work and we support managers to be better leaders.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I have seen the difference it makes.
lender.occupational_info: International development

lender.name: Shujaat
lender.loan_because: i want donations to continue my higher education.

lender.name: Marissa
lender.loan_because: I want to help people with businesses in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am going to medical school to become a doctor.

lender.name: Burt
lender.loan_because: I'm spreading the love

lender.name: Lauren and Tony
lender.loan_because: Mankind is my business...
lender.occupational_info: Education of children, ages 7-10.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can and because I am a small business person myself and know the value of having the capital needed to get to the next level.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a network administrator (I take care of lots of computers) and I also do consulting for small businesses.

lender.name: JSL
lender.loan_because: A small change can make a great difference.

lender.name: Garrett
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I make drinks and serve food.

lender.name: Sietske
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deservice a good life.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my 5 year old son, and my baby daughter . And I study for social worker. I would like to work with childeren, when my daughter goes to school.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: it will likely do some good, more good than the money will do here.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of pregnant women and do surgery.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I so agree with Kiva's philosophy of empowering people to help themselves and not just given a "hand-out". I do this as well, (donate to charities) but there is a more satisfying feeling to know that people are doing best when helping themselves and that I have been a small part in supporting them.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired elementary educator having taught 3rd grade through 6th grade. Also a specialized kinesiologist, teaching courses and writing articles, presentations, books for people to help themselves be well naturally.

lender.name: Stijn
lender.loan_because: I have it and they don't.
lender.occupational_info: I sell computer games to hardware manufacturers.

lender.name: Gerald
lender.loan_because: It's great to collaborate in something worthwhile.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I believe that God provides some people with the ability and the opportunity to share their blessings with others. It is only by sheer luck and circumstance that I have as much wealth as I have. It is my responsibility to be a productive steward of that wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I design websites and make commercials for businesses to advertise their products.

lender.name: Cameron' Dad
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving a hand-up instead of a hand-out. A rising tide raises all ships.
lender.occupational_info: We produce energy using solar panels and wind turbines. In turn, we sell that electricity to the major utilities.

lender.name: Georgia
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Whimiscal

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because:
Although the world is full of suffering it is also full of the overcoming of it.
My wish and goal in life is to make a less fortunate person fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Internet Online marketing Entrepreneur who helps people build businesses and friendships as well as support Charity.

lender.name: Pieter
lender.loan_because: I Care

lender.name: Rui
lender.loan_because: I believe it is possible, with a little help from those who can, to change the lives of people with whom we share the common pursuit of happiness
lender.occupational_info: I work in the field of Corporate Social Responsibility and try to help the company I work for to fulfill its goals and expectations concerning its social and environmental responsibility

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: To help business owners reach their goals.

lender.name: Kennon
lender.loan_because: i have been given much, and now it's time to give back

lender.name: Linda Sullivan
lender.loan_because: My sons gave me a Kiva gift certificate for my birthday. They know that giving to others is what makes me happiest. I have been so fortunate to live in the USA, have a good education and a steady income. I want to help others get a rung up on the economic ladder so they can educate their children. I believe that education is the key to preventing future wars and creating the opportunity to grow and care for others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a public health nurse. I track contagious diseases and work to prevent the spread of illness. I teach people how to be healthy and live more fully into a healthy old age.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I lived in Nairobi, Kenya, when I was young and saw how much of a difference access to credit can mean for people. "Banker to the Poor" by Mohammad Yunus, founder of Grameen Bank, is also very inspiring.
lender.occupational_info: I help to start new businesses and also to fix businesses which are not doing so well. I have mostly worked in software and high technology, my most recent business openned 10 offices in developing countries around the world and sought to better the lives of all citizens in each of these regions.

lender.name: MagazineEspresso
lender.loan_because: Giving is living, my friend.
lender.occupational_info: Espresso Bar

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I want people to be able to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a refinery; making gasoline, diesel and jet fuels.

lender.name: John & Marilyn
lender.loan_because: it encourages sustainable growth, it's empowering, and it makes financial sense.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to lend a helping hand to others who are making their own way and working to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies make their websites work harder and smarter.

lender.name: AndrÃ©ia
lender.loan_because: Eu adoro trabalhar com animais..

lender.name: Michaela & Austin
lender.loan_because: we can and are following the example set by our parents.

lender.name: Joerg
lender.loan_because: It helps others to fulfill their endeavours of entrepreneurship, to make a living and to become more independent.
lender.occupational_info: Responsible for a porcelain manufactury still producing in the purest sense of the 18th century. Preserving a tradition of 260 years of craftmanship at the highest level and being avantgarde in porcelain at the same time.

lender.name: DSU TR Scholars
lender.loan_because: We believe we can change the world for the better one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of honors students attending Dickinson State University.

lender.name: Aubree
lender.loan_because: I cannot be aware of suffering and do nothing.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I can and care

lender.name: UIUC SPAN 332
lender.loan_because: The class is entitled "Spanish & Entrepreneurship: Languages, Cultures & Communities." We focus on social entrepreneurship, and through Kiva, students are learning what can be accomplished in Latin America through social e-ship.
lender.occupational_info: I (Ann Abbott) am a professor of Spanish at the University of Illinois. I am interested in community-based learning and social entrepreneurship in US Latino and Latin American communties.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: I know that my help can have a big impact on someone who is working hard to change their life.

lender.name: Ricardo
lender.loan_because: Estou com uma loja online de calÃ§ados e nÃ£o tenho o valor inicial para comeÃ§ar o negÃ³cio.
lender.occupational_info: Loja online de venda de calÃ§ados para todas as idades.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: ... it works.
lender.occupational_info: My work helps my boss do his work. of financial/investment consulting I arrange travel, pay the bills ... plus a whole host of other miscellaneous things that keep me busy and my job interesting.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I like to see people start and expand their businesses. I know what its like to not have enough money to do everything you'd like to do!
lender.occupational_info: I work with engineers at my company and and manufacturers around the USA. I help find suppliers for office furniture components.

lender.name: Siva
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who work hard to earn a living.

lender.name: Ritu
lender.loan_because: I want to help woman around the world create a better life for themselves and their families
lender.occupational_info: My job is extremely rewarding because I help people by making sure that they have access to the medications that they need.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I want to show my children that a small contribution for me can make a big difference to somebody else.

lender.name: Csilla
lender.loan_because: I want to give to those who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: office job

lender.name: Charline
lender.loan_because: I can:) Every little bit helps!

lender.name: Seema
lender.loan_because: because i love the fact that by pooling our resources we can all make the world a better place for those who need a helping hand, however small it may be.
lender.occupational_info: i keep track of money for a big healthcare provider in virginia

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I have seen the life-changing effects of small loans first hand.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites.

lender.name: Kai
lender.loan_because: I enjoy to support such a great idea as microlending. This idea has the potential to improve our world and can give efficent support to people in developing countries.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Someone needs it more than me.
lender.occupational_info: Have you heard of the internet?

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of human beings to strive to better their own life and the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student seeking a degree in business. I have started my own non-profit organization that gives money to help other students like myself. When I graduate I want to start other businesses and some day be a major lender to people with bright ideas.

lender.name: Mark Fairey
lender.loan_because: I like having a direct connection to the party that funds are lent to, I like getting feedback on how my modest contributions have contributed to the borrowers' success, and it makes me more aware of the challenges faced by people in parts of the world that i know very little about.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: We all have dreams and goals and to succeed and accomplish is a beautiful feeling. I believe this feeling is a right and not a privelage. I believe that economic circumstance should not hinder a person who has the drive and passion to go to the next level. I would like to help those achieve what all of us essentially strive to achieve.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I know how tough running a business is
lender.occupational_info: I own a health food store/laundromat, and also work nights putting sports pages together for newspapers

lender.name: Maia
lender.loan_because: I feel that everyone should be given the chance to earn a decent living , and sometimes all they need is a small push to get them rolling
lender.occupational_info: I help to get the newest medical technologies tested and made available to those who need them.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It just feels like the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at Earlham College. I'm studying Music and Computer Science, but I'm still unsure as to what I am going to do with my life.

lender.name: Karla
lender.loan_because: When I make a loan, I'm not just investing money. I find that I become interested in the person who receives the loan, their business, their family, their part of the world. It enriches me, and expands my horizons.
lender.occupational_info: I manage people who program computers.

lender.name: katherine
lender.loan_because: I want to help people change their worlds, as I have received help to change my own. I could not have started my business without the support of others.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: it is good to feel that with the little extra that you have you can help someone take a big step towards a better future.

lender.name: Kevin Miles
lender.loan_because: It's a great, direct way to help people. and watch it change someone's quality of life.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: We are all that we have. We must help each other get on our feet. We have to reach out to those less fortunate than we are, who have a dream, and aspire to make a better life for themselves. We must take a chance on each other that good still exists in the world, and that we to can have an impact. Our legacy is those we helped, and lives we touched along the way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a marketing manager for a large constuction company, and working on my B.S in Nursing.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: My giving is based on a simple formula: "I love because God first loved me" plus "As you do it unto the least of these you do it unto me" add "To whom much has been given much is required" = Giving to Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: Employee Assistance Counselor working with businesses and non-profits.

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: I've been extraordinarily lucky, and consider it an honor to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I write books and short stories.

lender.name: Arnie, Kelli and Nathan
lender.loan_because: We have been so fortunate and want to assist others
lender.occupational_info: We own and operate a book and gift store

lender.name: hedningarna
lender.loan_because: The small and remote BouvetÃ¸ya [Bouvet Island] also want to take part in developping the world - and started to loan with microcredits.

lender.name: CS Management
lender.loan_because: We loan because it allows us to learn about elements of management in concrete ways. Our funds come from our local SIFE - Students in Free Enterprise organization.
lender.occupational_info: We are students studying management at a two-year college in Cincinnati, OH.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help small businesses, particularly those run by women, succeed.

lender.name: Samuel and Janice
lender.loan_because: we believe that people everywhere should have the opportunity to pursue their goals for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: We are both pastors servicng Christian congregtions in the US.

lender.name: Inness
lender.loan_because: rejoice!!!

lender.name: Muhammad Rashid
lender.loan_because: To grow my business. And through that income I can build house for my family.
lender.occupational_info: I m a farmer. Breeding cows and buffaloes. Through loan I want to increase my animals number. So the production of milk increase and i get more profit.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: God made a world of abundance... there is more than enough for everybody is each person only takes the share of it that they truly need...
lender.occupational_info: to recognize that we are ALL in relationship with one another.... we are all connected. Once we recognize this basic tenet, how we live will change. It is only when I recognize my brother, my sister, in need, will I step up and do the right thing. We are one.

lender.name: Regan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a wonderful way to help others establish themselves financially. It is a pleasure to give!
lender.occupational_info: I am semi-retired. I am a land development consultant and land surveyor.

lender.name: Arad
lender.loan_because: I believe in the model and want to help others.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: A hand up is better than a hand out

lender.name: Chaba
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Doing what I love to do.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part to help make the world a better place and this seems like a great way to do it!
lender.occupational_info: My passion lies in photography, philanthropy, wildlife and conservation.

lender.name: Rani
lender.loan_because: I have witnessed the miracles that a conduit for entrepreneurship and innovation can achieve for people with little hope, even in the midst of turmoil. This is the universal language: the ability to realize oneâs dreams and creations. Without a supportive network and a means to achieve these goals, countless entrepreneurs will surely face further disenfranchisement and despair in a world facing increasingly complex social and economic challenges.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I believe small business success generates a way out of poverty for the owners as well as others around them.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I'm at a point where I can, and I'd like to make a difference.

lender.name: International Club
lender.loan_because: As the International Club of University of Portland, we want to reach out to the rest of the world by helping communities continue to grow. Each academic year, we fundraise hundreds of dollars to support developing economies specifically in areas that our students call home.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of international and US students that represent 32 different countries. We promote friendship, mutual understanding, and acceptance among persons from various cultural backgrounds within our community. We encourage justice, unity, and peace by organizing social and philanthropic activities.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: It's fascinating and fun to follow the progress made with such a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I am an English woman managing a small convenience store/gas station owned by two Indian men in The USA. We are truly an international outfit despite being small! The store is open 24/7. Our receipts are $3500 - $ $200 daily. The store is run by myself, an assistant manager, 2 full time cashiers and 2 part time cashiers. Besides gas/petrol, diesel and kerosene/parafin, we sell hot and cold beverages, candy, snacks, groceries, auto supplies, cigarettes, prepaid cell phone minutes, moneygrams and lottery tickets. We do not sell alcohol. We take cash, checks, travellers checks, credit and debit cards.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to be Canadian and want everyone to have the chances that I get
lender.occupational_info: I go to elementry school in Canada

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I have a cousin who was adopted from Ethiopia and think it's really cool what this orginization is doing, and it makes sense!
lender.occupational_info: I learn stuff that I (hopefully) will using later in life...

lender.name: Mona
lender.loan_because: It's a very good idea. My friends invited me and I intend to continue lending after the loan is paid.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: This is the solution which will end the hideous gap between rich and poor.
lender.occupational_info: I lead active travel tours all over the world, currently specializing in the Pacific Northwest of the United States. More relevantly, I am an entrepreneur trying to start my own travel company with microfinance as a component.

lender.name: Mimi, Diana & Pati
lender.loan_because: The True joy of Life is to help others, and by doing so you will truly feel ALIVE!!
lender.occupational_info: It is so rewarding for us to help those in need. Helping others helps to put things into perspective!

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I want to help people succeed at their work.
lender.occupational_info: I write programs for computers and small devices. The programs tell the devices what to do and how to do it.

lender.name: Jolley Family
lender.loan_because: we are a family that has received many blessings and we would like to help bless the lives of others
lender.occupational_info: I create colorful, eye-catching images for companies to use on their computers. I also create web pages so companies can share their ideas via the internet.

lender.name: Markell
lender.loan_because: We all deserve a chance to achieve our dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I am am real estate investor/developer

lender.name: Marin
lender.occupational_info: I'm an undergraduate student at the University of South Carolina, studying international business.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe the majority of people don't want handouts or to feel they can't make it on their own. I truly think many just need a little helping hand to get them on the path to making it on their own. Kiva appears to be a vehicle to help make that happen.
lender.occupational_info: I design and implement website applications.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I want to support their passion and their drive to move forward.
lender.occupational_info: I provide investment opportunities to individuals and companies across the world.

lender.name: Jay & Mona
lender.loan_because: GIVE a person a fish and you feed the family for a day. TEACH the person to fish and feed the family every day. Our loans help TEACH the value of capitalism while helping improve the borrower's quality of life.

lender.name: B.J. Spamer
lender.occupational_info: I work for a U.S. non-profit organization, handling cases of long-term missing and unidentified deceased children.

lender.name: Kyle Baer
lender.loan_because: This is a free market approach to enabling entrepreneurs in third world countries. By providing these countries with access to capital, we can help them improve their infrastructure and create sustainable enterprises.
lender.occupational_info: I help PNC manage a pool of capital that we use to buy private companies.

lender.name: YETI Students
lender.loan_because: We would like to share our blessings and use our money and talent to help people across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: We are high school students from St. Scholastica's College, Manila, Philippines. We raise funds by buying and selling wholesale products and we believe in making tithing a habit.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate my entire life and now that I am retired, I want to do something tangible to help people in other parts of the world improve their standards of living on a basis that is sustainable.
lender.occupational_info: I provided advice to businesses; large, medium and small to help them become more efficient, effective and successful. Since retiring in June 2011, I do some consulting and am working on my first novel which I hope to have published in 2013!

lender.name: Martin & Debi
lender.loan_because: We know what it is to be an entrepreneur and we want to help people realize their goals.
lender.occupational_info: Martin has a business renting recreational vehicles for vacations. Debi is a nurse practitioner caring for older people who live in nursing homes.

lender.name: JoandDoug
lender.loan_because: i want to help
lender.occupational_info: i do research and writing for a business

lender.name: Noel
lender.loan_because: it's a great feeling to be helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I manage commercial properties

lender.name: Sarah & Ed
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lender.name: beth, jesse & lani
lender.loan_because: Kiva's a great way to get kids to participate and understand that we all have a responsibility to help others in any and every way we can.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a motion picture studio.

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: The cost to me is much less than the benefit to those who are receiving.
lender.occupational_info: Construction project management (buildings).

lender.name: Samira
lender.loan_because: I want to see others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I used to be a teacher, but currently stay at home to raise my 2 children.

lender.name: Michele, Falmouth,MA
lender.occupational_info: I teach children ages 5-11 years old who have learning or behavior problems.

lender.name: Aimee
lender.occupation: Medical Practice Manager and Arbonne Consultant

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance in life

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I grew up in a very low income city and I am very blessed to have the opportunity now at my age to help others that are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I sell health insurance

lender.name: Jo M
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to get financing, even for a small business in the U.S. with good credit. I have spent time in the Russian republic (Far East), although not in Tajikistan, and I know how difficult it is to start a business there. I hope I can make a small difference.
lender.occupational_info: Helping businesses get stories in newspapers and magazines and on radio and television shows.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do

lender.name: Melissa
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctoral candidate in Christian Ethics, focusing on HIV/AIDS and women.

lender.name: Jennica
lender.loan_because: God blessed me financially... I'm thankful for the opportunity to help!

lender.name: Jason & Fayellen
lender.loan_because: We want to help without being condescending; which we feel a lot of organizations are. Just giving feels good to the giver but not always for the receiver. Kiva allows people to ask for help with dignity.
lender.occupational_info: We both hold degrees in multimedia design (we do things like news graphics and websites) and we're both artists; he in oils & pencil and me in watercolors/inks & photos.

lender.name: Hsiao FY
lender.loan_because: It's so wonderful that I can help someone else.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I'm optimistic enough to believe that I can make a positive difference to someones life and its feels pretty damn good too.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help my clients market themselves on the internet mainly through search engines. I also work on helping my clients improve their websites for their customers.
